org.apache.soap.server.http
Class RPCRouterServlet

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.servlet.GenericServlet
        |
        +--javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
              |
              +--org.apache.soap.server.http.RPCRouterServlet
public class RPCRouterServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

This servlet routes RPC requests to the intended method of the intended object.

Author:
Sanjiva Weerawarana (sanjiva@watson.ibm.com), Matthew J. Duftler (duftler@us.ibm.com), Steven McDowall (sjm@aptest.com), Eric M. Dashofy (edashofy@ics.uci.edu), Kevin J. Mitchell (kevin.mitchell@xmls.com), Wouter Cloetens (wcloeten@raleigh.ibm.com)
